pychell API reference¶

Forward Models¶

class pychell.rvs.forward_models.ForwardModels(forward_model_settings, model_blueprints, order_num)¶

Bases: list

Contains individual forward models in a list, and other helpful attributes, primarily for RVs.

create_output_dirs()¶

Creates output dirs and filenames for outputs.

cross_correlate_spectra(iter_index=None)¶

Cross correlation wrapper for all spectra.

Parameters

iter_index (int or None) – The iteration to use. If None, then it’s assumed to be a crude first guess.

fit_spectra(iter_index)¶

Forward models all spectra and performs xcorr if set.

Parameters

iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

init_parameters()¶

Initializes the parameters for each forward model

load_templates()¶

Load the initial templates and store in both.

print_init_summary()¶

Print a summary for this run.

save_results()¶

Saves the forward model results and RVs.

save_rvs()¶

Saves the forward model results and RVs.

static solver_wrapper(forward_model, iter_index, n_spec_tot)¶

A wrapper for forward modeling and cross-correlating a single spectrum.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model object

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

  • n_spec_tot (int) – The total number of spectra for printing purposes.

  • output_path_plot (str, optional) – output path for plots. Defaults to None and uses object default.

  • verbose_print (bool, optional) – Whether or not to print optimization results. Defaults to False.

  • verbose_plot (bool, optional) – Whether or not to plot templates with the forward model. Defaults to False.

Returns

The updated forward model since we possibly fit in parallel.

Return type

forward_model (ForwardModel)

sort()¶

Sorts the objects by BJD, in place.

Model Components¶

class pychell.rvs.model_components.BasicFringingModel(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult

A basic Fabry-Perot cavity model.

Default constructor for an empirical multiplicative model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.MultModelComponent

Base class for an empirically derived multiplicative (or log-additive) spectral component (i.e., based purely on parameters, no templates involved). As of now, this is purely a node in the Type tree and provides no additional functionality.

Default constructor for an empirical multiplicative model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.FullBlazeModel(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult

A full blaze transmission model. A sinc^(d) and an additive cubic spline correction are used.

n_splines¶

The number of wavelength splines.

Type

int

n_delay_splines¶

The number of iterations to delay the splines.

Type

int

splines_enabled¶

Whether or not the splines are enabled.

Type

bool

blaze_wave_estimate¶

The estimate of the blaze wavelegnth. If not provided, defaults to the average of the wavelength grid provided in the build method.

Type

bool

spline_set_points¶

The location of the spline knots.

Type

np.ndarray

Default constructor for an empirical multiplicative model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.GasCellModel(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.TemplateMult

A gas cell model which is consistent across orders.

Constructs a multiplicative model that uses a template.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.GasCellModelOrderDependent(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.TemplateMult

A gas cell model which is not consistent across orders.

Constructs a multiplicative model that uses a template.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFHermiteModel(blueprint, dl, nx_model, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFModel

A Hermite Gaussian LSF model. The model is a sum of Gaussians of constant width and Hermite Polynomial coefficients.

hermdeg¶

The degree of the hermite model. Zero corresponds to a pure Gaussian.

Type

int

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFModel(blueprint, dl, nx_model, default_lsf=None, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.SpectralComponent

A base class for an LSF (line spread function) model.

compress¶

The number of lsf points is equal to the number of model pix / compress.

Type

int

dl¶

The step size of the high resolution fidicual wavelength grid the model is convolved on. Must be evenly spaced.

Type

float

nx_model¶

The number of model pixels in the high resolution fidicual wavelength grid.

Type

float

nx¶

The number of points in the lsf grid.

Type

int

x¶

The lsf grid.

Type

np.ndarray

default_lsf¶

The default LSF to use or start from. Defaults to None.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFModelKnown(blueprint, dl, nx_model, default_lsf=None, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.LSFModel

A container for a known LSF.

Attr:

The default LSF model to use.

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.MultModelComponent(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.SpectralComponent

Base class for a multiplicative (or log-additive) spectral component.

wave_bounds¶

The approximate left and right wavelength endpoints of the considered data.

Type

list

base_par_names¶

The base parameter names (constant) for this model.

Type

list

par_names¶

The full parameter names for this specific run.

Type

list

Default constructor for a multiplicative model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

build_fake(nx)¶

Returns an array of ones.

Parameters

nx (int) – The number of points to build a model with.

Returns

An array of ones.

Return type

np.ndarray

class pychell.rvs.model_components.ResidualBlazeModel(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult

Residual blaze transmission model, ideally used after a flat field correction. A quadratic and an additive cubic spline correction are used.

n_splines¶

The number of wavelength splines.

Type

int

n_delay_splines¶

The number of iterations to delay the splines.

Type

int

splines_enabled¶

Whether or not the splines are enabled.

Type

bool

blaze_wave_estimate¶

The estimate of the blaze wavelegnth. If not provided, defaults to the average of the wavelength grid provided in the build method.

Type

bool

spline_set_points¶

The location of the spline knots.

Type

np.ndarray

Default constructor for an empirical multiplicative model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.SpectralComponent(blueprint, order_num=None)¶

Bases: object

Base class for a general spectral component model.

blueprint¶

The blueprints to construct this component from.

Type

dict

order_num¶

The image order number.

Type

int

enabled¶

Whether or not this model is enabled.

Type

bool

n_delay¶

The number of iterations to delay this model component.

Type

int

name¶

The name of this model.

Type

str

base_par_names¶

The base parameter names of the parameters for this model.

Type

str

par_names¶

The full parameter names are name + _ + base_par_names.

Type

str

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.TemplateMult

A star model which may or may not have started from a synthetic template.

Attr:

from_synthetic (bool): Whether or not this model started from a synthetic template or not.

Constructs a multiplicative model that uses a template.

Parameters

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.StarModelOrderDependent(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.TemplateMult

A star model which is order dependent. For now this is only used for Minerva-Australis.

Attr:

input_dir (str): The defualt directory the Minerva-Australis reduction pipeline produces for a given target.

Constructs a multiplicative model that uses a template.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.TelluricModelTAPAS(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.TemplateMult

A telluric model based on Templates obtained from TAPAS. These templates should be pre-fetched from TAPAS and specific to the observatory. Each species has a unique depth, but the model is locked to a common Doppler shift.

species¶

The names (strings) of the telluric species.

Type

list

n_species¶

The number of telluric species.

Type

int

species_enabled¶

A dictionary with species as keys, and boolean values for items (True=enabled, False=disabled)

Type

dict

species_input_files¶

A list of input files (strings) for the individual species.

Type

list

Constructs a multiplicative model that uses a template.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.TemplateMult(blueprint, wave_bounds, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.MultModelComponent

A base class for a template based multiplicative model.

input_file¶

If provided, stores the full path + filename of the input file.

Type

str

Constructs a multiplicative model that uses a template.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.WaveModelHybrid(blueprint, pix_bounds, nx, default_wave_grid=None, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.WavelengthSolutionModel

Class for a wavelength solution which starts from some pre-derived solution (say a ThAr lamp), with the option of an additional spline offset if further constrained by a gas cell.

n_splines¶

The number of wavelength splines.

Type

int

n_delay_splines¶

The number of iterations to delay the splines.

Type

int

splines_enabled¶

Whether or not the splines are enabled.

Type

bool

spline_pixel_set_points¶

The location of the spline knots.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.WaveSolModelQuadratic(blueprint, pix_bounds, nx, default_wave_grid=None, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.WavelengthSolutionModel

Class for a full wavelength solution. A “base” solution is provided by a quadratic through set points, and a cubic spline offset is added on to capture any local perturbations.

n_splines¶

The number of wavelength splines.

Type

int

n_delay_splines¶

The number of iterations to delay the splines.

Type

int

splines_enabled¶

Whether or not the splines are enabled.

Type

bool

base_pixel_set_points¶

The three pixel points to use as set points in the quadratic.

Type

np.ndarray

base_wave_zero_points¶

Estimates of the corresonding zero points of base_pixel_set_points.

Type

np.ndarray

spline_pixel_set_points¶

The location of the spline knots in pixel space.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.WavelengthSolutionModel(blueprint, pix_bounds, nx, default_wave_grid=None, order_num=None)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.SpectralComponent

A base class for a wavelength solution (i.e., conversion from pixels to wavelength).

pix_bounds¶

The left and right pixel bounds which correspond to wave_bounds.

Type

list

nx¶

The total number of data pixels.

Type

int

default_wave_grid¶

The default wavelength grid to use or start from.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.
